UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile in the EduStream application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

dateJoined.description: Date when the user joined EduStream.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. The 'userId' parameter corresponds to the Firebase Authentication UID, ensuring that each user's profile is stored separately and securely. This structure enables path-based ownership, where only the authenticated user can access their own profile data.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Authentication UID of the user.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to store user profile information upon account creation. The primary goal is to ensure a simple and secure way to manage user data. This design prioritizes storing user profiles in a dedicated collection for easy access and management. There are no complex access patterns or collaborative data requirements outlined in the user's request.
